verses.text:
Soul and spirit, flesh and dwelling, Sheltered by the circle of grace,
I shall be satisfied when I awake in thy likeness, I shall be satisfied then.
Patient wait God's time for giving, Warmth and thought too lily-like,
Born of God, he shall not die, Who are here with all the grace.

I shall be satisfied when I awake, I shall be satisfied
I shall be satisfied when I awake, I shall be satisfied

chorus.text:
Soon shall come the Prince of Peace,
For the highest one of all,
Then shall each well last one day,
When the soul is sat - is - fied,
I shall be sat-is-fied when I awake, I shall be satisfied.
I shall be sat-is-fied when I awake, I shall be satisfied.
